steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"s579","text":"The water production for AWARE main activities includes three stages – disinfection by ultraviolet C radiation (UVC), storage for - (according to water load and season) and ozonation. The water quality is monitored at these three stages, for the parameters indicated in Figure 1 below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":129,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":131,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1konq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flf22","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8jvq4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":43200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":0,"preset":[],"start":0}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":274,"id":466978,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"1-.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qibecd64x.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qibccd64x.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qibdcd64x.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qibbcd64x.webp","width":550}}}}

steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"60to2","text":"Store the cartridges in a freezer ( ) 


All samples are to be processed in duplicate.


For the cartridge blanks (n=2): start with , and then spike directly on the cartridge the same amount of internal standard as for samples ( mix de ).  Then go directly to .
For the ultrapure water blanks (n=2), the same type of sampling flasks are filled with ultrapure water before sampling. Then they are treated using the same protocols as for samples.


Elution of the loaded cartridges was carried out by gravity using of methanol followed by of dichloromethane. The eluates were concentrated approximately to ca. using a Turbovap II concentrator (Zymark, Hopkinton, MA, USA), then to dryness under a gentle nitrogen stream and finally reconstituted in of methanol and filtered with a GHP‱ syringe filter (Pall Corporation). The extracts were injected in an Agilent 1290 LC coupled with and Agilent 550 QTOF system. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":131,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":228,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":235,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":259,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":364,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":512,"length":1},{"key":7,"offset":536,"length":1},{"key":8,"offset":607,"length":1},{"key":9,"offset":746,"length":1},{"key":10,"offset":778,"length":1},{"key":11,"offset":783,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7mo7k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D5218743784C4305B88123A3C80DD84A","step_guid":"BEBFF4198B0446F6882D498B8A9ADD9C","title":""}},"10":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1ug","error":true,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"11":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":201,"value":"13"}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"4":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C9A79773944B4875B0C6B3636DC7226E","step_guid":"F103BA810ABD472D82FB442DEB95216B","title":""}},"5":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"6":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"7":{"type":"amount","mutability":"M
